動物用藥品名稱: 貝歐克雞傳染性喉頭氣管炎活毒疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
地址: S.S 234 PER CREMONA, KM 28, 2 27013 CHIGNOLO PO (PAVIA) ITALY
效能(適應症): 預防雞傳染性喉頭氣管炎。
ingredients: ACTIVE INGREDIENT PER DOSE:AT LEAST 10^2.5 EID/50 OF INFECTIOUSLARYNGOTRACHEITIS VIRUS, ATTENUATED STRAIN PV 09, GROWN ON CAMSFROM SPF EMBRYONATED EGGS AND LYOPHILIZED WITH SELECTEDPROTECTIVE STABILIZERS.
